A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What a disappointing movie!  Some of the fight scenes are fun\, but upon reflection you quickly realize this movie single-handedly destroys so much of the legacy that made Star Wars great. This is the worst insult imaginable to the star wars saga.\nWay too many plot holes and inconsistencies!\nCool special effects\, but too many plot twists that don't make any sense.
